subject: Concussions
Lacrosse
Soccer
Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The Ivy League announced that its presidents accepted a series of recommendations for lacrosse and soccer made by a committee, including the possibility of suspension for hits to the head.
snippet: The Ivy League announced that its presidents accepted a series of recommendations for lacrosse and soccer made by a committee, including the possibility of suspension for hits to the head.
